name: Professional Laptop 15" Pro
description: High-performance laptop designed for business professionals. Features a stunning 15-inch Retina display, powerful processor, and all-day battery life. Perfect for presentations, data analysis, and creative work.

name: UltraBook 13" Lightweight
description: Ultra-lightweight laptop weighing just 1.1kg. Perfect for travelers and mobile workers who need power on the go. Features a beautiful edge-to-edge display and instant wake technology.

name: SmartPhone X12 Pro Max
description: Flagship smartphone with professional-grade camera system. Captures stunning photos in any lighting condition. Features 5G connectivity, all-day battery, and the most advanced mobile processor.

name: Wireless Noise-Canceling Headphones
description: Premium wireless headphones with industry-leading noise cancellation. Enjoy up to 30 hours of wireless playback. Features adaptive sound control and speak-to-chat technology.

name: FitPro Smart Watch
description: Advanced fitness smartwatch with comprehensive health monitoring. Tracks heart rate, sleep, blood oxygen, and over 100 workout types. Water-resistant to 50 meters.

name: Ergonomic Office Chair Pro
description: Premium ergonomic office chair with advanced lumbar support system. Fully adjustable armrests, seat depth, and headrest. Breathable mesh back keeps you cool during long work sessions.

name: Electric Standing Desk
description: Height-adjustable standing desk with dual motor system. Smooth and quiet height adjustment from 60cm to 125cm. Features programmable memory presets and anti-collision technology.

name: 4K Professional Monitor 32"
description: 32-inch 4K UHD professional monitor with exceptional color accuracy. Factory calibrated for creative work. Features USB-C connectivity with 90W power delivery.

name: Mechanical Keyboard RGB
description: Premium mechanical keyboard with hot-swappable switches. Per-key RGB lighting with millions of color options. Features PBT keycaps and programmable macros.

name: Ergonomic Wireless Mouse
description: Vertical ergonomic mouse designed to reduce wrist strain. Features precision optical sensor and silent clicks. Rechargeable with up to 3 months battery life.

name: Tech Travel Backpack
description: Water-resistant backpack designed for tech professionals. Features padded laptop compartment, cable organizer, and USB charging port. TSA-friendly design for easy airport security.

name: 4K Pro Webcam
description: Professional 4K webcam with AI-powered auto-framing. Features advanced low-light correction and noise-reducing microphones. Perfect for video conferences and content creation.

name: Creative Tablet Pro 12.9"
description: Professional tablet for creative work with 12.9-inch Liquid Retina display. Supports stylus with pressure sensitivity and tilt detection. Powerful enough to run desktop-class creative apps.

name: 100W GaN USB-C Charger
description: Compact 100W GaN charger with 4 ports. Simultaneously charge laptop, tablet, phone, and accessories. 40% smaller than traditional chargers with same power output.

name: 360Â° Bluetooth Speaker
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with 360-degree sound projection. Water and dust resistant (IP67). Features 24-hour battery life and built-in microphone for calls.
